description.en: Korean Bulgogi - a classic europe dish.
description.zh: Korean Bulgogi - a classic europe dish.
description.sv: Korean Bulgogi - a classic europe dish.

en: 300 g beef sirloin
30 ml soy sauce
2 cloves garlic
zh: 300 g 牛肉 sirloin
30 ml 酱油
2 cloves 大蒜
sv: 300 g nötkött sirloin
30 ml sojasås
2 cloves vitlök

en: Prepare the main ingredients: beef sirloin, soy sauce, garlic.
Season or marinate as needed for flavor.
Serve immediately with rice or bread.
Cook using appropriate method (grill, sauté, bake, or simmer) until done.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.
zh: Prepare the main ingredients: 牛肉 sirloin, 酱油, 大蒜.
Season or marinate as needed for flavor.
Serve immediately with 米饭 or bread.
Cook using appropriate method (grill, sauté, bake, or simmer) until done.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.

Season or marinate as needed for flavor.
Serve immediately with ris or bread.
Cook using appropriate method (grill, sauté, bake, or simmer) until done.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.
